stories.fact: A knife-wielding individual dies after being shot by Paris police at the Arc de Triomphe.
President Trump stated a second aircraft carrier is leaving shortly for the Middle East. Trump stated that a change in power in Iran would be 'best' following the aircraft carrier deployment.
stories.source: France 24 - 10.0 (12/12) | Al Jazeera English - 9.0 (9/10) | PBS NewsHour - 8.4* (2/3)

stories.fact: Storm Nils caused two deaths in France and left hundreds of thousands without power.
President Emmanuel Macron stated at the Munich Security Conference that Europe must become a geopolitical power independently.
